title: Submit Annual Tier II Report
description: An EHS specialist needs to submit the annual Tier II Emergency and Hazardous Chemical Inventory report to state and local agencies.

tasks.description: Generate a report of the maximum and average quantities of all hazardous chemicals stored on site over the last year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully queries the inventory system for the required data.

tasks.description: Use the inventory data to populate the Tier II reporting form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly fills out the report with all chemicals exceeding the reporting thresholds.

tasks.description: Submit the report through the state's online portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uploads and submits the final report.
